detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract VERANDEREN (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VERANDEREN.sol#233-311) has payable functions:
	 - VERANDEREN.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VERANDEREN.sol#238-240)
	 - VERANDEREN.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VERANDEREN.sol#242-253)
	 - VERANDEREN.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VERANDEREN.sol#255-259)
	 - VERANDEREN.batchSend(address[],uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VERANDEREN.sol#262-274)
	 - VERANDEREN.constructor(string,string,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VERANDEREN.sol#302-310)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
